name: 鄭有進
objective: 本課程探討物件導向程式設計的原理, 語言與環境, 基本設計方法,  並以課程專題製作的方式使學者熟稔物件導向觀念. 課程內容: 物件與類別, 訊息傳遞, 繼承, 組合, 虛擬方法與多型性, 模板, 物件導向語言與環境, 專題
schedule:
1 Software development process
2 A Quick Tour of C++
3 Introduction to UML
4 Inheritance and Polymorphism
5 Design pattern: Singleton, Strategy
6 Design pattern: Composite; Unit testing with CppUnit
7 Design Pattern: Iterator, Template Method, Interpreter
8 Design pattern:   Visitor, Builder
9 midterm
10 Model, view and controller (MVC); Design pattern: Observer
11   Qt tutorial; Design pattern: Chain of Responsibility, Command
12 Design pattern: Memento, State
13 Design pattern:  Flyweight, Facade
14 Design pattern: Abstract Factory, Factory Method
15 Design pattern:  Mediator, Prototype
16 Design pattern: Adapter, Bridge
17 Design pattern:  Decorator, Proxy
18 Final
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance, quizzes, and Homework 60%
2. Midterm Exam 20%
3. Final Exam 20%

Textbook:

2. Stanley B. Lippman, Josee Lajoie, and Barbara E. Moo, C++ Primer, 4th Edition, Addison Wesley, 2005.
